title: Neovim GUI written in Golang using libui
author: Vinz_
content: readme.md neovim gui written golang, using forked ui libray https://github.com/andlabs/uirequirementsneovim (0.2)installworking macos linux get -u github.com/dzhou121/gonvim/cmd/gonvim succesfully installing gobin, can run gonvimfeaturestabline fuzzy finder the guifunction signature popuplint message popupfont change font, install https://github.com/equalsraf/neovim-gui-shimchange font size call:guifont monaco:h13change line space:guilinespace 8
